entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
